file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-50-15-04 - EXIT LOCATING SIGN ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EXIT LOCATING SIGN ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the exit sign assembly. B. The exit sign assembly is located on the emergency exit headliner panel installation. C. Attention must be given to safety precaution presented below, when working on the exit sign assembly. • Disconnect electrical power. • Always use insulated tools when working on or near electrical circuits. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EXIT LOCATING SIGN ASSEMBLY - RE- ALL 33-50-15-000-801-A MOVAL EXIT LOCATING SIGN ASSEMBLY - IN- ALL 33-50-15-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-50-15 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-15-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EXIT LOCATING SIGN ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This section gives the procedures for the removal of the exit sign assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the Task Passenger Cabin H. Removal of the Exit Sign Assembly (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the pin contacts (1). (2) Remove the exit decal (2). (3) Remove the electro-luminescent lamp (3). (4) Remove the screws (4) from the sign housing (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-50-15 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Exit Locating Sign Assembly Figure 401 1. PIN CONTACT 5. HOUSING 3. ELECTROLUMINESCENT LAMP 2. EXIT DECAL 4. SCREW EM145AMM331026A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-50-15 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-15-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. EXIT LOCATING SIGN ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This section gives the procedures for the installation of the exit sign assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the Task Passenger Cabin H. Installation of the Exit Sign Assembly (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the screws (4) in the sign housing (5). (2) Install the double sided tape on the back side of the electro-luminescent lamp (3). Install the electro-luminescent lamp on the sign housing (5). (3) Apply the adhesive that is supplied with the exit decal (2) to the back of the decal. Install the exit decal. (4) Install the pin contacts (1). I. Follow-on SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) Test the operation of the emergency exit sign at the attendant control panel (switch NORM/ON).
